data.actual_result: The text does not show (on light theme)
data.short_description: The “joined” text is missing from servers you have already joined on light theme
data.steps_to_repro: - go to settings - go to theme and switch to light - find a invite for a server you already joined and noticed that the “joined” text is missing - now go back to settings and switch to dark - notice the “joined” text appears
